name: dogfighty
description:
game and art by:

Austin Fox (fostinaux@gmail.com)

fly a blue fighter against the hordes of green space pirates.

Use lasers on them to win! Except you can't win, because this

is a jam game. Made in 48 hours for the first annual BCIT

game jam.

== [ Controls ] ==

movement: arrow keys

shoot: x

boost/brake: left shift/ctrl

the window can be resized freely

== [ Version info ] ==

v1.0 -- post jam windows port and bugfix release
